content: Question: Is the company aware that all suspected or known incidents – including any “red flags” - that may impact Goldman Sachs data, systems, and/or network services must be reported to Goldman Sachs immediately upon discovery (or as agreed upon within the contractual time frame)? | Answer: Yes | Details: Danfe Corp takes its responsibility to notify customers of serious incidents very seriously. Danfe Corp maintains a formal incident response plan in a document called "Playbook - Security and Privacy Incident Response Plan". Danfe Corp's internal policy documents are not currently available in a scrubbed form for sharing externally. If you have any specific questions about them, please let Danfe Corp know. The response plan includes steps for: initiating the response plan, escalation, information gathering, engaging external resources, investigation, analysis, mitigation, restoration, notifications if necessary, and post-mortem. Danfe Corp implements extensive monitoring which will automatically alert the Danfe Corp Operations team, which is on-call 24x7x36. | Category: Incident Management
